question: Which state is set to organise the Sub-Tropical Fruit Expo 2020?
explanation:
The Horticultural Department of Haryana is organising a five-day Sub-Tropical Fruit Expo 2020 till July 22.
The expo is being organised at the Centre for Sub-Tropical Fruit at Ladwa that is an Indo-Israel project. The cultivation techniques of sub-tropical fruit are explained and streamed live on social media, so that the farmers can learn the technologies under the ‘Mera Pani - Meri Virasat’ crop diversification scheme.
